The controller is the account that will: The controller is the account that will be used to control any nominating or validating actions. Should not match another stash or controller.
The destination account for any payments: The destination account for any payments as either a nominator or validator
The total amount of the stash balance th: The total amount of the stash balance that will be at stake in any forthcoming rounds (should be less than the total amount available)
The maximum amount to increase the bonde: The maximum amount to increase the bonded value, this is adjusted using the available free funds on the account.
Please select distinct stash and control: Please select distinct stash and controller accounts
A controller account should not map to a: A controller account should not map to another stash. This selected controller is a stash, controlled by {{bondedId}}
A controller account should not be set t: A controller account should not be set to manages multiple stashes. The selected controller is already controlling {{stashId}}
The selected account is not an ed25519 (: The selected account is not an ed25519 (Edwards) account as required for validation
For fund security, your session key shou: For fund security, your session key should not match your stash key.
The account {{sessionId}} is not a valid: The account {{sessionId}} is not a valid account
The Threshold must be a positive number: The Threshold must be a positive number
Stash accounts that are to be nominated. Block rewards are split between validators and nominators
Changing the key only takes effect at th: Changing the key only takes effect at the start of the next session. If validating, you should (currently) use an ed25519 key.
Warning - Changing the controller while: Warning - Changing the controller while validating will modify the associated session account. It is advised to stop validating before changing the controller account.
The controller is the account that is be: The controller is the account that is be used to control any nominating or validating actions. I will sign this transaction.
Changing the key only takes effect at th: Changing the key only takes effect at the start of the next session. If validating, it must be an ed25519 key.
The maximum amount to unbond, this is ad: The maximum amount to unbond, this is adjusted using the bonded funds on the account.
Amount taken up-front from the reward by: Amount taken up-front from the reward by the validator before spliting the remainder between themselves and the nominators
The number of time this validator can ge: The number of time this validator can get slashed before being automatically unstaked (maximum of 10 allowed)
A controller account which is not the sa: A controller account which is not the same as your selected account is required
Reward that validator takes up-front, th: Reward that validator takes up-front, the remainder is split between themselves and nominators
The number of allowed slashes for this v: The number of allowed slashes for this validator before being automatically unstaked (maximum of 10 allowed)
After setting a lock limit, you will rec: After setting a lock limit, you will receive an additional KTON bonus; if you unlock it in advance within the lock limit, you will be charged a penalty of 3 times the KTON reward.
You are in the status of a nominators an: You are in the status of a nominators and cannot be a node for now.
We will develop the upgrade to be a node: We will develop the upgrade to be a node function in future.
You can manage POWER with bond more/unbo: You can manage POWER with bond more/unbond asset, which can be used to nominate nodes to earn RING. RING/KTON will have 21days of unbonding status after unbond. Assets in thiis state can not nominate and transfer
1. You need to stake some KTON or RING t: 1. You need to stake some KTON or RING to get power for nominate.
2. Please make sure that you have some e: 2. Please make sure that you have some excess RING in this account as gas fee.
3. After you choose to become a nominee,: 3. After you choose to become a nominee, this account does not support to upgrade to node for now, we will support the upgrade of the account in the future.
You are in the status of a nominator and: You are in the status of a nominator and cannot be a node for now.
Please replace the account and retry.
1. Please make sure you have 3 available: 1. Please make sure you have 3 available accounts.
2. Please make sure that there are a few: 2. Please make sure that there are a few ring in the account as gas fee.
3. You need to stake some KTON or RING t: 3. You need to stake some KTON or RING to get power for validate.
If you want to unlock the ring that set: If you want to unlock the ring that set the lock limit
Participating in node nominating may gai: Participating in node nominating may gain more earnings
